data.text: Summer is almost here! Treat your family to a travel that they will forever treasure! #PALWanderlist https://t.co/nO311gpXx7

Given the chance, where would you take Madonna in the PH? A surprise awaits the lucky one so keep those photos coming! #PALHeartsMadonna

Merlina @lename. Upon checking, the 4:20pm flight for TACMNL today 21FEB16 has no seats available already. Thank you.

Always look at the bigger picture. ☺ #TravelPAL

Our FAs are all smiles and ready to say hello to our #TravelPALs today! #PALFlyFriday  © @iahllmido via IG https://t.co/T6Nb4FRXbc
Discover the most beautiful places in the Philippines with your most beautiful love. #PALTravelLokal https://t.co/16XlEsmmsr
Lock and don’t let go of your loved one & put a lock on these five Love Lock destinations. #PALWanderlist https://t.co/AKv6CHUsG2

The answer to our #PALTrivia is Port Moresby! The first 15 who answered correctly will be sent a DM- there's a surprise waiting for you. :)
Hello #TravelPALs! Here's our #PALTrivia for today! What is the capital of Papua New Guinea? :)
Bonus #PALTrivia: In which PAL domestic destination can you find the Blue Hole, which is well-known among divers? :)
Last one! Can you answer this?  To what Middle Eastern city will PAL fly to on March 28, 2016? #PALTrivia
2nd to the last question, let’s go ☺  Which Saudi Arabian city is closest to the Red Sea? #PALTrivia
Shoutout to the Middle East! Where can you find the Liberation Tower? #PALTrivia

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: Un figlio alla volta
entity.description: Frankie e Mike si sentono in colpa perché non trascorrono abbastanza tempo con i loro figli. Decidono perciò di dedicare a ciascun figlio un'intera giornata durante la quale saranno a completa disposizione dei loro pargoli. Axl sceglie una partita a paintball, Sue pianifica ben diciassette attività diverse.

data.text: Let’s keep on going!  On March 15, 2016, PAL flies to LA from which Philippine city? Hint: Queen City of the South #PALTrivia
Know the answer to this one?  What city is also known as the Big Apple? #PALTrivia
This is an easy one!  Where is the Great Barrier Reef? #PALTrivia
Still there? :-) Third time’s a charm! Which country is famous for Hobbitown? Make sure you're following us when you answer! #PALTrivia
Hi @janebracher, that's right! We'd like to give you Fusion Festival tickets as a token for participating :-) We'll DM you for more info!
We're just warming up, #TravelPALs! Here's another one: Where can you find the Buckingham Palace? :) #PALTrivia
Hi @jonahasis! You're the 1st one to get it right! We’d like to give you Fusion Festival tickets as a token! We'll DM you for more info :)
#PALTrivia Are you ready? First question! Which country is famous for matcha/green tea? Make sure to follow us and reply w/ you answer!
Hi #TravelPALs! Are you ready for some #PALTrivia? Stay tuned for a few travel questions. We’d love to hear from you! :)
When you have the Heart of a Filipino, you can always be #confidentlybeautiful. Welcome home, Pia! #MostBeautifulDay https://t.co/DJPHR6ZPwK
The Heart of a Filipina is what makes her truly beautiful. Welcome home, @PiaWurtzbach! #MissUMostBeautifulDay https://t.co/n4JfcFWo2p
Welcome home #MissUniverse2015 Pia Wurtzbach! #MissUMostBeautifulDay https://t.co/5oYvVPzAuV
